website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use, this is everyone's favorite choice for instantly creating bold dramatic lashes.
pros: Large curvy brush produces thick black lashes with a slight curl
Formula glides on smoothly and dries quickly
One coat is all you need
Thick wand is comfortable to hold
Product lasts about 4 to 6 months with daily use
cons: Mascara works best when paired with a lash conditioner to avoid clumping

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is knockoff or if too faced ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is knockoff or if too faced changed their packing and brush but this mascara tube is a different font than the one I got at ulta and the brush is much different.
customer_reviews.author: Loni Kent

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE- IT’S FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware!! This product is FAKE, a knock off version. This first indication was the packaging- it was peeling and looked cheap. Too Faced products are NOT cheap, and neither is their packaging. I have a previous Better Than Sex mascara that I compared it to. The one I received was obviously NOT a Too Faced product. The wand was completely different and so was the mascara tube. Different color, markings, and look. If you’ve used Too Faced- you can spot a fake quite easily. I am very disappointed that I wasted my money on this cheaply made mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Latie

customer_reviews.title: it is NOT the Too Faced Better than Sex mascara
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product; it is NOT the Too Faced Better than Sex mascara. I’ve been using the real product for years. At first when I received the product through amazon, I thought maybe they had changed their brush, but when I used it... it was clear this was a fake product. Completely different brush, clumps lashes, and the mascara itself is like tar. Spent about 15 minutes washing & PULLING this product off of my lashes. Amazon —-stop selling this product
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This is NOT the real thing....see attached photo and zoom in on all of the misspelled words on the label!! This stuff is a gooey mess! Buy it from an authorized dealer for the same price as they are charging here!
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: FAKE - Not the real mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara I have bought it from sephora atleast 10 times, didn't want to deal with going there so I tried buying it online and this is not the real too faced better than sex mascara. I pulled out my old one to throw is away and I noticed the top of the new one is a different color than the bottom of the container and the mascara brush is a .99 mascara brush you would get at cvs. If you have purchased this product before you would know it has an hourglass brush. Also the mascara brush is on the box. I didn't use the product as it smelled weird. DO NOT BUY FAKE
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Atkison

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: i feel bad because my order come with out cover its like not original and i cant use it
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz Alrashid

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the reviews before ordering. I assumed since the seller was “too faced” the product would be legit but I knew instantly when I opened the mascara that something was off. The consistency, the feeling, the application, everything was different! This makes me so mad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! This product is fake. It comes in the correct packaging but the product inside is definitely not the real Too Faced BETTER THAN SEX mascara. The brush is too small, the mascara is goopy, the lettering on the tube is slightly different, as well as the color. Save your money and buy somewhere more reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Lack Luster Performance
customer_reviews.text: I did a one coat to one coat comparison. For it to be called "better that sex" I expected a dramatic lash, what I got was lashed that looked like they were hardly wearing anything. Lame sauce. The wand is that rounded hourglass type shape so its a big harder to manipulate in the corners of the eye. I prefer a cone shape or the type that has the little ball on the end of the wand. I get better results with my Benefit 'They're Real' mascara after one coat. Not happy and not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Geena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I ever lived without this. No need for fake eyelashes with this mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Brown

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion...Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Better than Sex mascara for quite a while. It makes my lashes that are barely there look like they used to! This Mascara IS NOT the same as what I buy in the store! I actually used the older one over the new and got better results! :(((
customer_reviews.author: TL in Texas

customer_reviews.title: The best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down this is the best mascara I have ever used. I am in my 40's and in the last few years my eye lashes started thinning out. I have tried so many different mascaras and this one is the absolute best. It adds length and volume to my eye lashes and keeps me from feel self-conscience. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking to thicken their lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Dixon

customer_reviews.title: It’s a knock off!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t quite figure out why this mascara was so terrible since I only ever wear too faced (I wore it twice and just couldn’t use this one again) Well I finally purchased the actual mascara from Ulta. Turns out this is FOO faced mascara. Added a little dash to the name and changed the bottle’s color. A complete knock off. Extremely unfortunate and kind of funny it took me so long to figure it out. DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! It cost me MORE than the actual brand and was a knock off. Photo of the real brand and the foo faced for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it when I bought from the store rather than online
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of this same mascara in stores. For some reason when I ordered off amazon this product was totally different. Not the same thickness that I have gotten before and the mascara itself didn't seem as full. I would recommend buying it at your local store rather than online.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I received a small tube of the TOO Faced Better Than Sex Mascara in an Ipsy bag
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I hoped for! I received a small tube of the TOO Faced Better Than Sex Mascara in an Ipsy bag, and fell in love, so I ordered the full-size and just love it! I have very fine eyelashes, and this mascara makes it look like I actually have long, thick lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Cameron

customer_reviews.title: I CANNOT STRESS ENOUGH how wonderful this mascara is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had originally purchased the water proof version for my bachelorette party in Cancun. I kept putting off buying the non waterproof version because I just continued to use the waterproof one. Finally I caved and bought this because the waterproof one was a little difficult to take off every other day. I CANNOT STRESS ENOUGH how wonderful this mascara is! It adds volume, length and isn't too clumpy. It is a really great base and the day after makes an even better top coat. LOVE this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Avoid buying online
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product from Ulta and loved it! After using the entire tube, I ordered the same product off Amazon and it did not feel/look like the product I bought from Ulta. Not sure if it was real or not, and was very disappointed. My lashes did not have any volume. If you are looking for a very light, natural look then this product is for you. Otherwise, I would recommend buying in-person to make sure it is coming from a legit source.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: SO HARD to get off!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this mascara looks alright, however I did a side-by-side comparison on my lashes with a $6 drug-store mascara and multiple people couldn’t tell the difference. What ruined this product for me is how hard it is to remove!!! It took so many of my lashes with it and I soaked and scrubbed with makeup remover, only to still have some left on my lashes (no, I did not buy the waterproof version). After all this trouble, the mascara comes off in chunks rather than dissolving and leaves a mess all over my bathroom sink. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: She swears by this stuff. Apparently there is some technique to putting it on, but I don't know, I'm a dude. She looks great, but she looks great without makeup too.
customer_reviews.author: Crowbait

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara, but comes off a little too easily for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this mascara. After my first tube ran out, I purchased the "Roller Lash" by Benefit Cosmetics. I love "Better Than Sex," however I hadn't really noticed how much came off under my eyes throughout the day until I switched back from Roller Lash. The mascara gives a tremendous amount of volume and length, creating a false lash look, but if you need something for long wear, I would not recommend this one without a very good setting spray.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: one of my fav mascaras
customer_reviews.text: recent this item in a beauty box I receive monthly, loved it so much had to look of course on amazon and find this product and purchased for when I am out of the original one, I am ready to use this one, cost more than supermarkets but last better and applies much better. get it a try.
customer_reviews.author: katydid

customer_reviews.title: Great cruelty free mascara IF they stick with their promise
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to find a mascara that is cruelty free. After I purchased this I discovered Estee Lauder bought the company and EL allows tests on animals. However, Too Faced states they will continue in the humane path and PETA has asked us to continue to purchase to send a message to Estee Lauder. Best mascara and will continue buying unless I hear they've gone back on their promise.
customer_reviews.author: iamvirg

customer_reviews.title: "Worst Sex I Ever Had"
customer_reviews.text: Instead of " better than sex ", it should be called " worst sex I ever had"! Too thick and too much. You have to scrape off most of it just to apply it. It flakes throughout the day and by the end of the day it looks like you slept in your makeup. By far the worst mascara I have ever used. A waste of money...Awful, terrible, beware...just say "No"...
customer_reviews.author: Zombie Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: After trying almost every mascara known to man, I’ve dealt with a lot of mascara issues. Clumping, running, irritating, etc. THIS mascara is by far the very best I’ve ever tried! It goes on easily, it doesn’t run & (most importantly) NO irritation!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser gave me a tip that makes the mascara go on smoother. Slightly heat the tube with a hairdryer and roll the tube between your fingers. It goes on great. Covers well. Does flake a little, but it is the best mascara I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not the real stuff!!! This ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real stuff!!! This is a scam. Tube looks the same but the brush is completely different. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara - made me switch brands
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara! My mom had bought me a tester tube and I liked it so much I sprang for the large one. I've been using the same L'oreal massacre for 15 years... so changing to this brand is a big step for me! Most importantly it didn't burn my eyes when I missed the eyelashes and landed in my eye.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I am very glad I did - I love this
customer_reviews.text: I have use benefits mascara for a long time and I was hesitant to try a new brand. I am very glad I did - I love this. It goes on easy and only requires a few coats. My lashes look long and thick, without looking clumpy. I have sensitive skin and this did not cause any sort of eye irritation for me. It was also easy to remove. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: thebee1517

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! Don't Order
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mascara for YEARS and when I saw it available on Amazon I was super geeked for the convenience. THIS IS NOT THE REAL THING. This has been the worst mascara I've ever used. It literally puts me in a bad mood every day I use it. It makes a huge mess, is super watery, doesn't stay on your eye lashes, and the packaging is different. I am LIVID. $25 is more than a meal out! This is outrageous amazon! You should do better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Klein

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this from Sephora for years and I'm so happy to find it on Amazon. This is by far the best mascara around. High volume looks natural and is not clumpy. Lasts for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Y tho!?
customer_reviews.text: After all the rave reviews I expected perfection. The mascara is nice, I like the packaging and the applicator is awesome... HOWEVER it is not waterproof and it crumbs and smudges.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t like the other Better Than Sexual mascara I’ve bought in the past (the others were not purchased from Amazon). Being in quarantine I thought I would purchase here. The brush ain’t as full ( I actually kept my previous wand) and the product is watery. It does not make my lashes full. I have to let it dry which takes approximately 5 minutes and then brush them out. I would not purchase this product from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hussey

customer_reviews.title: horrible product!
customer_reviews.text: horrible product!!! It's is my #7, it was nothing like the last one i got 3 months ago: different brush, different tube (it used ti be metal, now it's light plastic). What happened with the last product!!!????? For this kind of quality I got, I could get the same one from Wallmart, like a cover girl or rimmel .I won't recommend it anymore. Such a disappointment!! I was trying to avoid Sephora, now, I have no choice.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome eyelashes

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it online
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite mascara ever for a long time now, still is. But I'm definitely disappointed with the product that was delivered to me. Box was dirty insid, seemed to be used, not sealed. I was expecting to save time from going to the store and now I after waiting a week I not only need to go shopping on the store but I also need to stop at the post office to return this. The Product is great, but my recommendation is but it from a physical location.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Ellis

customer_reviews.title: It really is FAKE
customer_reviews.text: this mascera really is FAKE. It doesnt work as amazing as the real one does at Ulta. The tubes are the exact same but saw major differences when using the real one bought from Ulta and the fake one bought here. Dont buy this. It is the same price as the REAL one in the store
customer_reviews.author: LGA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: First, I have used ALOT of different mascaras in my time. I went with Two Faced Better Than Sex Mascara on a recommendation from a friend. Despite the poor star rating I thought I'd give it a shot. Yeah......no. No good. In fact HORRIBLE! It flakes off and lands in your eyes irritating them to death. Plus leaves black smudges under your eyes leaving you looking like a hot messssssss! So disapointed..
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: MOST DEFINITELY FAKE
customer_reviews.text: FAKE FAKE FAKE. It is much more watery than the real Better Than Sex. It smears all over, I thought it needs time to dry, but it’s just not happening, it won’t dry and you’ll look like a raccoon by the end of the day. I will never ever buy this mascara online again, it’s so much safer just going to Ulta. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Madonna

customer_reviews.title: I used more than one coat, great results!  No flaking!
customer_reviews.text: I am always trying new mascaras, I just can't seem to find one that I really like, but I love this mascara, it really gave great results, I used a few coats, but not as much as I have to with other mascaras. This one will be my new regular.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: nope. not worth the work involved.
customer_reviews.text: 1. i’ve never had to scrub so much to remove this mascara off my lashes. i’d expect it for waterproof, but this is the regular formula! 2. the formula is thick. brushing it on my lashes has resulted in gross spider lashes and forced re-do several times. mom of toddler+infant — i don’t have time for reapplication in the morning. 3. the brush bristles are so coated in formula, it’s a mess trying to keep your lashes separated and full and pretty. bottom line — it’s nit worth the effort over impact. i’ll find something much easier that accomplishes the results i want — for cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I always worry about ordering cosmetic on Amazon for authentication purposes but it seems like the real deal. Works great. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bieber

customer_reviews.title: I have used Two Faced Better Than Sex mascara for over a year now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Two Faced Better Than Sex mascara for over a year now and it is my favorite mascara by far!! I normally get it from the store but this time I ordered it on Amazon. I don't know whether the Amazon mascara is different or if this is an old bottle but the mascara was not the same as the stuff I buy from the store. From the outside they look identical, but the brush on the Amazon one is way smaller and the liquid is like sticky. Normal great mascara, that's why I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Zamora

customer_reviews.title: I've paid 1/4 the price for a store brand that was better. My product is dry and flakey
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time trying, so I'm not sure if it's just a faulty tube or if this is how the mascara always is... but awful mascara. I've paid 1/4 the price for a store brand that was better. My product is dry and flakey. By mid-day it's come off :( application has also been an issue- its clumpy on my lashes (and even on the brush when I pull it out the tube). If my particular tube isn't really old, and this is actually how the product really is, I'm amazed it sells at all. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $$$, it is WORTH every Penny!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a mascara that instantly goes on thicker, this is your mascara! I have tried just about every single mascara on the planet, and this one takes the entire cake. The brush is really full and from the first use, you will be happy that you spent the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Rees Family

customer_reviews.title: Lengthens and Thickens
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample in a Glossybox and loved it as soon as I tried it. My lashes and fine and short and this mascara lengthens and thickens better than any other brand I've tried, and I've tried many brands. I've had no irritation or flaking and it lasts all day. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Tailypo

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara I have found so far!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST mascara I have ever used. This is my third bottle of this stuff. I have tried dozens of mascaras. I am so happy that I found this one and that it is available on Amazon. My daughter loves it too, but I will not buy it for her because of the name :( Amazon delivery was fast and it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: STACY M. JACOB

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this Better Than Sex mascara is the BEST!!! The volume is amazing and it never clumps. The wand is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Being as frugal as I am, it is a true testament coming from myself that this is totally worth the money! This mascara is about the only product I will spend more than $15 on simply because IT WORKS. It gives tons of volume and length, and does NOT clump your lashes (something I have a problem with with many drugstore brands) and it lasts foreeeever, so it's with the money. One coat is great for definition and length, 2 coats is pretty dramatic, and 3 coats it will look like you have false lashes on. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Addie McClure

customer_reviews.title: Love this product by something is wrong with this bottle
customer_reviews.text: Not the same container as my previous purchase of this product and it is completely gooey and impossible to apply. Love this product by something is wrong with this bottle. Unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Greta L.

customer_reviews.title: Dried out... possibly old product
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it was kind of dried out... I use this mascara all the time... it is always a great product... maybe it was old????
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: It was terrible. I recommend buying from the actual company because ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara for the first time from the actual company. Then I tried amazon... and the wand and quality were different. I bought a third tube from the company again and got the original wand and quality. The one I got from amazon was sticking to my eyelashes so much that my eyelashes were coming out !! It was terrible. I recommend buying from the actual company because it is a great mascara !!
customer_reviews.author: Sell the house

customer_reviews.title: This is a knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute knockoff. Nothing about it is the same as the original and i returned it immediately. The photos people are posting of the side by side are absolutely accurate. Different wands, different formula, different casing, barely stamped lettering, etc. Do not buy! Go to Sephora and make sure its the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: used to love this
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they switched the formula over the last 2 years but I used to be obsessed with this mascara.. the most recent one I bought made my lashes clump so bad it looked like 4 giant fat lashes. So ugly and messy. My new fav is roller lash by benefit if you need a good one that separates!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Cantu

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but this is terrible! I just had a baby and couldn’t leave ...
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this is terrible! I just had a baby and couldn’t leave the house...i ended up buying the mascara just for the easiness of not having to go to sephora and grab it. THE MASCARA IS NOT THE REAL ONE! It makes your eyelashes stick together, it’s not even the right brush and it is NOT the better than sex mascara. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this mascara. I was on Pinterest looking for the BEST mascara, and I came across this. I have long eyelashes naturally, but this mascara makes them MASSIVE!! I LOVE IT! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Baiz-Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, sexy lashes! Sex still might be better though! ;)
customer_reviews.text: Really love this mascara! Highly recommend and there are some bristles on the end of the wand for those harder to reach shorter lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan K

customer_reviews.title: Lashes to remember
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ! Been using it for years , makes eye lashes full and long with just one coat ! Must buy if you want unforgettable eyes
customer_reviews.author: SarahAlexisFay

customer_reviews.title: Hate this!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this. It is thick, clumpy, hard to apply and, on my long, but copper colored lashes, makes them look and feel heavy, goopy, and droopy. I tried it for envirno. reasons and based on reviews, but this is the most disappointing mascara I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J.

customer_reviews.title: Old and dried up
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara and it’s not cheap so you can imagine my disappointment when I receive this package and the mascara is dried up. It was in a crushed box which makes me think it wasn’t new. I’m very disappointed and will not buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Nash

customer_reviews.title: Love my lashes
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Makes my eyelashes seem longer and fuller. Better than any I have bought from the regular store.
customer_reviews.author: Jenbasham

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely a knock off. I put this in my daughters stocking and she knew immediately when she took it out of the package. The letters are spaced different on the item, the weight is much lighter. She showed me one she had and it was not the same. Returned the item and got the real one at Ulta for 3 dollars less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter happened to mention this mascara just as I ran out of my last one. I have to admit, I love this stuff. It doesn't clump, it goes on easily and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! I used it once and it worked great. Not sure what’s in it but I’m a more organic person so I stay away from chemicals. You don’t need a lot to get the long eyelash look.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Daughters favorite mascara. Mascara is the only makeup she wears, and it really brings out her lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It's raved for
customer_reviews.text: It's a popular mascara - try it and find out. It really does add a great amount of volume and when you apply multiple layers (wait a few seconds in between) it does add to the overall effect. Only thing I would say is that it does smudge throughout the day and sometimes when i apply it, it clumps my lashes together and i have to go in with an eyelash brush to separate them.
customer_reviews.author: Uche

customer_reviews.title: It's a good mascara, but no better than others I have ...
customer_reviews.text: It goes on really well for the first coat. When I try to double coats to make it thicker, it clumps my eyelashes together and straightens them out rather than supporting the natural curl. It's a good mascara, but no better than others I have had. I wouldn't say it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Speth

customer_reviews.title: Not what was described.....
customer_reviews.text: They sent waterproof! Doesn’t say waterproof anywhere in the ad. But I was out and leaving on a business trip, so I used it. I hate waterproof. Too hard to get off. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Momma Burk

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mascara it adds length and lots of volume to your lashes. Plus the color is a deep deep black it makes your eyes pop!!!! Awesome stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Steinert

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite mascaras, it does leave dark rings if I ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite mascaras, it does leave dark rings if I wear on my lower lashes but thats a small trade off for how my top lashes look with it on!
customer_reviews.author: The Andrada Family

customer_reviews.title: This product came highly recommended but I found that this mascara made my lashes ...
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended but I found that this mascara made my lashes look too clumpy no matter what I did so it wasn't for me. I had to apply fast in order in order to reduce the Tammy Fay Baker look. But again, could just be me because the person that recommended it...her lashes always look great.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina R Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Probable Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I believe that I received a counterfeit product. I compared it to the one I purchased from Sephora and the font on the tube is slightly different as is the way the mascara cap and wand clicks close. Also, the mascara itself smells really weird!! Totally different than the mascara I’m used to purchasing from Sephora. It doesn’t perform as well either. Something is off.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Maddocks

customer_reviews.title: Not like the OG mascara that I am obviously partial to..
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is meant to replace the old Too Faced mascara that was truly the best I have ever tried. This one has none of the qualities as the old one, and messy to clean:/
customer_reviews.author: H_Green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - very effective
customer_reviews.text: goes on well, no smudging or clumping, looks great! What more can you ask? I reorder this regularly
customer_reviews.author: GiniRae

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Might dry out lashes tho.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this mascara goes on but it does dry out the lashes and is not the easiest to remove at night. But so far it is one of the best I’ve used. Way better than any over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: ... it crumbles off (the mascara that is) it looks great! just don't move or you have these little ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is that it crumbles off (the mascara that is) it looks great! just don't move or you have these little black specks falling from your eyelashes
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara, but I saw it was cheaper at Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flakes off
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend but flaked off by noon each day. I would not recommend or purchase again. I purchased mascara to replace it which was much cheaper and worked much better. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sticks like super glue and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to find a make up remover that can successfully remove this mascara. If you sleep with it on you wake up with what feels like super glue stuck on your eyelashes. It's almost painful to get this stuff off. I wouldn't recommend this mascara to anyone and I'd return it if I could. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: This is easily my favorite mascara. No clumping or running and is easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Not As Seen in Sephora
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected nor what I saw in Sephora. The formula feels almost plastic. It is incredibly hard to remove - with just soap and water it takes almost 5 minutes to get all flakes off my lashes. Normal eye make-up remover does nothing to help. The brush is different than I saw in Sephora too - much thinner and less bristles. A disappointment. I will not be buying from this vendor again and would only purchase from a brick and mortar makeup store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Packaged was open and the item appears to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Laece Ebarb

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This has to be fake or a bad apple. I’ve used this mascara for years and I never ordered from amazon until now and what I got was a clumpy, flaky mess. This is not the mascara I’m used to. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: A knock-off that’s more expensive than the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a knockoff. The mascara formula is different, it feels too light when holding the tube and on lashes. It comes in a plastic bag. I think it’s the right want (was it recycled???) but the bottom half does not match other Better Than Sex mascaras I have at home. The font is cheaper and again it feels really light. And it’s more expensive???
customer_reviews.author: linsey

customer_reviews.title: One Coat Wonder!
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara in the world!! I've already ordered 4 of these to give to my mom and my daughters-- they will be ordering their own in the future. They also love this Mascara. Doesn't clump and not too thin-- just perfect-- makes lashes full and long quickly with no more than one coat!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie A G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I received your Too Faced mascara and it’s quite different than the one I buy from Sephora. The brush is different and even once applied it is very different. There are also differences in the bottle’s appearance. I wish I was told it was a knock-off before I purchased it, but one review said it was the real deal. It is WAY too different to be the same brand/product and I use this mascara consistently and this is the first time it has been so different especially when I compared it to the others.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Thornburgh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is HANDS DOWN the best mascara on the market ... and I've tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki MacHale

customer_reviews.title: This mascara is the worst I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is the worst I've ever purchased. Goes on fine but it constantly smears under my eyes making me have raccoon eyes and it doesn't do much for my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit- stay away!
customer_reviews.text: This is counterfeit mascara. I have been wearing this mascara for years and know this is not authentic- the mascara not coming off with regular makeup remover and literally need to be pulled off my eyelashes was the first hint. I then noticed the wand was different and then when looking at the bottle itself noticed the printing was misaligned and not the same as other bottles I had purchased in the past (from Sephora). Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen R.

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara because I have sensitive eyes and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara because I have sensitive eyes and it doesn't both me. I don't feel like it is the same quality as store bought Too Faced. I will not be ordering from Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love this brand. This time it arrived completely dried out. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. My lashes look so long & voluminous.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have used several higher end mascaras that I would fall in love with and they would be discontinued. I have long but thin lashes so I am always looking for something that will make them fuller without clumping or getting too heavy. This is it! It doesn't flake off into my eyes after hours of wear the way cheap products do, the brush is cleverly designed to get your outer lashes without smudging onto your eyelid, and the viscosity is perfect. Hope they keep this one around for me to continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My applicator busted and its unusable.
customer_reviews.text: I use this mascara literally three times before the application container broke and now it's completely unusable. (The small sphere that is supposed to be used to take the gunk off the brush is stuck up inside of the lid. A king the applicator a goopy mess). When I did use it I liked it. But will not be replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Doug's kindle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not any better than any cheap drug store mascara. Rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for years and I usually buy it from Ulta. Thought I would save myself a trip and order it from Amazon. What I received look like what I buy at Ulta but did not in any way perform the way the ones I have bought from Ulta perform. I do not know if I got a bad or old tube or if the product is not as advertised but I am very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: miller_jnb

customer_reviews.title: It was not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I will never order this product from here anymore. The product was dry and seemed empty inside. I tried it as soon as I got it and instantly noticed it was empty and dry therefore, never used it. It was not a legit brand either. Very disappointing for the price I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Cornielle

customer_reviews.title: I do not this is the real product. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not this is the real product. The brush and consistency of the mascara is not even close to the product I have from Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!! Saw a friend of mine tried it so I ordered it too. So glad I did! Definitely my new favorite addition to the makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Julia K

customer_reviews.title: ... but I just had to when I saw my favorite mascara didn't have a five star rating
customer_reviews.text: I've never left an Amazon review before but I just had to when I saw my favorite mascara didn't have a five star rating! This is the BEST mascara I've ever you had and I've now been using it for probably four years. There's just nothing better and in the type to spend more time on my lashes than any other piece of my makeup. I consistently get compliments and asked what I use on my lashes. I def recommend and am re-ordering it as soon as I click to submit this review!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L Linn

customer_reviews.title: This product is FAKE!  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I would like to rate this with zero stars, but that wasn't an option. When I received this imposter mascara, the packaging was the same as the original, but the brush was different. It actually smelled like glue. When I used it, I could not remove it with eye makeup remover, and it actually took my own lashes off. I went to Ulta and bought the actual product and had none of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R Taber

customer_reviews.title: Better than Mac
customer_reviews.text: Bettet than everything else I've used. All drug store brands etc. And very pretty pink container. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
